SELECT Z.MATER_NO MATERIAL_NO, Z.MATERIAL_NUM, PM.MATER_SPEC, PM.MATER_DESC, PM.MATER_TYPE, PM.MATER_MKIND FROM (SELECT WPD.MATER_NO, SUM(NVL(WPD.PRODUCT_QTY,1)) AS MATERIAL_NUM FROM WBS_BIN T INNER JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA WPD ON WPD.PACKAGE_GUID = T.PACKAGE_GUID GROUP BY WPD.MATER_NO) Z LEFT JOIN PSB_MATERIAL PM ON PM.MATER_NO = Z.MATER_NO
Z.MATER_NO like '%'||#where.MATERIAL_NO#||'%'
ORDER BY MATER_NO
